title: What are the weapons you would love seeing on a next champion ?
body:
For me, it's a scourge or a whip.

And you ?

replies.body: A scythe or some one who uses 2 swords
We have Fiddlesticks... but he doesn't use it to hit you. I want a melee champion who uses a scythe!

> [{quoted}](name=Raid Boss Morde,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=aW67yE8l,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-09-06T07:38:31.672+0000)
>
> We have Fiddlesticks... but he doesn't use it to hit you. I want a melee champion who uses a scythe!

shen? that is a champ with two swords
Saw this post and was thinking the same thing

a slingshot that shoots velociraptors...

or a poleaxe with rattlesnakes tied to the tip...

> [{quoted}](name=Captain Aishi,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=aW67yE8l,comment-id=0027,timestamp=2015-09-06T02:12:03.637+0000)
>
> a slingshot that shoots velociraptors...

I laughed way too hard at this.

Scythe is a good idea
Nunchaku or a Three-part-staff
Perhaps a bo-staff (we have mages, but I mean a martial artist type) though I think Jax is supposed to cover that...?
I'd love to see more non-humanoid champs, so claws and teeth are cool.
An elementalist (Fire, air, earth, water, etc) would be cool.

I would love to see someone with a cannon on their shoulder. Trist has a rocket launcher, but I mean something disproportionately large; maybe a member of Gangplank's crew. Abilities could include a skillshot, a melee stun, a shrapnel cone... the abilities are unfortunately already covered by champs with similar weapons, but I would love to see a pirate cannon or other massive artillery weapon on a League champ.

A book. I want to see someone smacking people upside the head with a gigantic encyclopedia or spell tome. Or make Ryze's AA animation against close range opponents smack people with his scroll.

You could have an assassin/ninja throwing needles. That's a thing, right?
Yo-Yos might make for an interesting weapon on a character concept like a kid that was one of Annie's friends.

> [{quoted}](name=gr8artist,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=aW67yE8l,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-09-05T19:45:38.867+0000)

> Yo-Yos might make for an interesting weapon on a character concept like a kid that was one of Annie's friends.

I would not mind this at all...
http://i49.tinypic.com/2s0e3is.gif

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/deathbattlefanon/images/6/60/Killua_Yoyo.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150501020953
+1 for Killua-chan
...chan...WUT?
that is a good idea man i like it!!!!!!!!!!{{champion:1}} {{summoner:14}}
A melee AP mage with a book. I'd play that.
For a moment i read "what weapon you want in another champion" and i tough "Diana with the 2 mordekaiser maces"
Scythe
{{item:3070}} {{champion:9}} {{item:3070}}

Motherfucking halberds, no one uses them and they're boss as fuckhttp://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/1/1f/Black_halberd_detail.png/revision/latest?cb=20130412180551 

It's a spear and an axe, what's not to love
Hecarim?
he uses a scythe
It's definitely a halberd.
I think it's more of a glaive...
Actually yeah, I think you're right. Nvm.

Hook swords
http://newsworld247.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/hook-sword-weapon5.png
they could have an ability where they hook together and double your range for a few attacks

Noooooooooo

Hook swords mean the new champ will be an arse like Jet.

http://25.media.tumblr.com/c0e70e9466037b14a5448feff74140f1/tumblr_mul9lqF35M1ql92t2o1_250.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=aW67yE8l,comment-id=0038,timestamp=2015-09-06T06:17:13.909+0000)
>
> Hook swords
> http://newsworld247.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/hook-sword-weapon5.png
> they could have an ability where they hook together and double your range for a few attacks

Kabal? :D
Honestly, I just really want a new champion that uses fans. Karma lost hers and they were my favorite thing about her.
ADC yordle or young human that carries a slingshot for a weapon.
dildo
LoL needs an adc like Aria Eagleheart, she throws daggers xD
Talon? Katarina?

http://wiki.chronicles-of-blood.com/images/thumb/Weapons-Double_crescent_axe.jpg/600px-Weapons-Double_crescent_axe.jpg
This
A real fan wielding champion would be cool
Double bladed sword-staff.

Pickaxe. Very powerful, so underused


{{champion:111}} And you don't count. That's an anchor
Nun chucks.

[I'd like a scythe champion, which is why I'm making one.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/jjTiyUnh-concept-stella-the-deathbound)

Besides that, a capoeira user would be nice.
Meteor Hammer. It would be a very unique weapon to animate and build a kit around.

A viking with a viking sword or perhaps spear.

Scythe definitely.

A flail (both a stick with a chain with a spiked stick on it AND the one that the Witch King of Angmar uses)

A melee wizard with a staff in one hand and a sword in the other (aka Gandalf)

A claymore.

Glaives.
I want a champ with no weapons and uses martial arts.
Is {{champion:64}} not good enough?

No because I meant a somewhat realistic martial art, I understand that LoL as a game is meant to be quirky rather than realistic but I would like something slightly more toned down from a flying kick traveling at mach 10 but at the same time I would like to see something little more stylized that somebody like {{champion:77}}.
######A FRIENDSHIP BRACELET THAT SHOOTS RAINBOWS.
Saxophone.

> [{quoted}](name=Coriandr,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=aW67yE8l,comment-id=005c,timestamp=2015-09-15T16:27:57.151+0000)
>
> Saxophone.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ZcmTl_1ER8
I have been wanting to see the whip for a long time. It could be used for damage or CC. They should rework Evelynn to have one, since it would fit her character.
Champ similar to yas but with dual swords. shen doesnt really count because they arent really swords, more like knives.
something to do with electricity, Riot hasn't really made a champion to do with that

> [{quoted}](name=xXelementalistXx,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=aW67yE8l,comment-id=005a,timestamp=2015-09-09T19:16:20.701+0000)
>
> something to do with electricity, Riot hasn't really made a champion to do with that

Kennen, Volibear

Scythe with magic... or a giant paintbrush
or possibly a heavy great-sword that has slow but powerful attacks.

> [{quoted}](name=Lil Amy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=aW67yE8l,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-09-05T20:57:29.534+0000)
>
> Scythe with magic... or a giant paintbrush
> or possibly a heavy great-sword that has slow but powerful attacks.
